formElement.label: Resource name
formElement.documentation: Name of the CloudBees CD resource that represents the WebLogic environment that needs to be discovered.

formElement.label: Resource Hostname
formElement.documentation: Hostname of a machine with WebLogic and CloudBees CD Agent running on it. Either Resource hostname (and port) or Resource Name should be specified.

formElement.label: Resource Port
formElement.documentation: Port of CloudBees CD agent running on the machine. Default is 7800.

formElement.label: Oracle Home
formElement.documentation: Installation path of the WebLogic server, e.g. /home/oracle. Not required if WLST Path parameter is specified.

formElement.label: WLST Path
formElement.documentation: Absolute Path to WLST utility. If not provided, the procedure will look for it, in known locations. Not required if Oracle Home is specified.

formElement.label: Weblogic Connection Hostname
formElement.documentation: Hostname to connect to WebLogic instance. Localhost by default.

formElement.label: Weblogic Connection Protocol
formElement.documentation: Protocol to connect to WebLogic instance. T3 by default.

formElement.label: WebLogic Credentials
formElement.documentation: Username and password to connect to WebLogic server.

formElement.label: Environment Project name
formElement.documentation: If specified will create Project for the Environment.

formElement.label: Environment name
formElement.documentation: If specified, will be used to create CloudBees CD environment.

formElement.label: Application Project name
formElement.documentation: Project name to create Application based on discovered objects.

formElement.label: Object Names
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Objects to be retrieved from the WL Server in type:name pairs. For example, AppDeployment:HelloWorld. For JMS resource, the name of the resource should be prefixed by the JMS module name: helloJMSModule:helloQueue.
The list of object names can be found in the .csv report generated by this procedure.
The list of supported object types are:
AppDeployment
Library
Server
Cluster
Datasource
Queue
Topic
JMSResource
JMSServer
ConnectionFactory
User
Group
